Name: Pixel Art Workshop
About the game: Pixel Art Workshop can transform any photo or image into pixel art. The best pixelation effects It can import and export animated gif and mp4 video files. It helps you to create material for your pixel art scenes. Has basic editing effects Creates parametric pixel art drawings from scratch with the scatter generator. It has retro CRT monitor effect. It also creates perfect pixel art drawings on images with alpha. It also has some basic alpha effects
